channel.title: web resources on Blogging on Earth
channel.description: Recent content in web resources on Blogging on Earth

item.title: Develop Websites
item.author: sunsp.gis@gmail.com (Shipeng Sun)
item.description: Develop Websites using R With RStudio and Quarto, there are quite a few options to develop simple but neat websites. From the RStudio, New Project, we can create Quarto Website, Bookdown, blogdown, and Simple R Markdown websites. Particularly for Quarto Website, all the interactive capabilities allowed by OJS could be incorporated. The Quarto Website is based on a bootstrap template and has a simplistic appearance. Jekyll and Jekyll Themes Today, way more people are using Jekyll and pre-defined Jekyll Theme to develop websites.

item.title: Items in Action
item.author: sunsp.gis@gmail.com (Shipeng Sun)
item.description: This is an ongoing list of items in actions, aka list of TODO items. So often, some good directions that deserve serious investigations and explorations have to be put off. This blog is trying to make a record of these resources. Open Geospatial Data White House Transparency and Open Government Open data: an international comparison of strategies Harvard CGA China Data Links USGS Data Quality Assurance Best Practice and Examples
